name: Self-Destruct Mechanism
Lore: '''''Fraid there''s not much left...I didn''t hit it that hard. It musta had a self-destruct.''',
Text: 'Lose a droid to cancel all attrition against you at same site this turn. OR Re-target an opponent''s weapon to one of your droids at same site. If droid is ''hit'', use original target''s forfeit number.',
